concept.title: SMC PGI 5315.203 Â Requests for proposals

conbody.p: Refer to the following for recommended or required language to be included in applicable solicitations:
SMC PGI 5309.506 for Organizational Conflict of Interest (OCI) instructions
AFFARS MP 5309.190 for Contractor Responsibility Watch List (CRWL) requirements
SMC PGI 5322.101-1-90 for Professional Employee Compensation
